Contributor: Flagg, James Montgomery, 1877-1960, artist.; N.W. Ayer & Son.; Liberty Loan Committee, publisher.;
Note: Signed "James Montgomery Flagg." Date of issue based on date of Third Liberty Loan campaign. Orientation:  Vertical. "Poster is contributed by N.W. Ayer & Son as an expression of complete unity with the aims and purposes of our National Government."
Description: Poster for the Third Liberty Loan campaign.  Beneath the portrait of a soldier, the text urges us to support our courageous troops by helping to supply needed equipment--Buy Liberty Bonds.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.
Subject: Liberty bonds -- United States.; World War, 1914-1918 -- Propaganda.; World War, 1914-1918 -- Finance -- United States.; War posters, American.;

Title: He can't be beaten
